content: The URL used for the single logout on the Identity provider side

comment.text: The "SPSingleLogoutURLTooltip" translation key provides a tooltip message explaining the purpose of the "SPSingleLogoutURL" field in the Portal Settings UI. It is used to inform users about the URL associated with single logout on the Identity provider side when setting up Single Sign-On (SSO) options, typically displayed in a button or dialog context.

usage.context:
<MetadataUrlField
 labelText={t("SPSingleLogoutURL")}
 name="spSingleLogoutUrl"
 placeholder={`${url}/sso/slo/callback`}
 tooltipContent={
 <Text fontSize="12px">{t("SPSingleLogoutURLTooltip")}</Text>
 }
 tooltipClass="sp-single-logout-url-tooltip icon-button"
 dataTestId="sp_single_logout_url"
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "عنوان رابط المستخدم لتسجيل الخروج الفردي من جانب مزود الهوية" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "The URL used for the single logout on the Identity provider side." A more accurate translation would emphasize that it's *the URL that is used*. The current translation implies the URL is *using* the provider.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان URL المستخدم لتسجيل الخروج الفردي من جانب مزود الهوية

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL şəxsiyyət provayderi tərəfində tək çıxış üçün istifadə olunur' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. It reads a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like: 'Şəxsiyyət provayderində tək çıxış üçün istifadə edilən URL' or 'Tək çıxış prosesini şəxsiyyət provayderində həyata keçirmək üçün istifadə olunan URL.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'от' is commonly used as 'на' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адресът, използван за единично отписване на страната на доставчика на идентичност

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "jednorázové odhlášení" can sound a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing for 'single logout' in this context would be 'společné odhlášení'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Společná adresa URL pro odhlášení na straně poskytovatele identit

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'einmalige' should be 'eindeutige'. While 'einmalige' translates to 'one-time', 'eindeutige' (unique) is a more accurate and common translation for single in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die URL, die für die eindeutige Abmeldung auf der Seite des Identitätsanbieters verwendet wird.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'εφάπαξ' (efápax) while technically correct for 'single', can sound a bit formal and potentially confusing for some users. A more common and easily understood alternative might improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Η διεύθυνση URL που χρησιμοποιείται για την αποσύνδεση από την πλευρά του παρόχου ταυτότητας

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Kertakirjautumisessa käytetty URL identiteetintarjoajan puolella" is a bit clunky and doesn't flow naturally in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would be 'Yksittäisen uloskirjautumisen URL identiteetintarjoajan puolella'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yksittäisen uloskirjautumisen URL identiteetintarjoajan puolella

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'single logout' is better translated as 'yksittäinen uloskirjautuminen' rather than 'kertakirjautuminen' as 'kertakirjautuminen' refers to single sign-on.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: yksittäinen uloskirjautuminen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'URL-ն, որն օգտագործվում է Identity մատակարարի կողմից առանձին դուրս գալու համար' is a literal translation and sounds somewhat awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Identity մատակարարի կողմից դուրս գալու համար օգտագործվող URL-ը'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identity մատակարարի կողմից դուրս գալու համար օգտագործվող URL-ը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL ທີ່ໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການອອກຈາກລະບົບດຽວຢູ່ຂ້າງຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ Identity' is a literal translation and could be improved for naturalness in Lao. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL ທີ່ໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການອອກຈາກລະບົບແບບດຽວກັນຈາກຝ່າຍຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການยืนยันຕົວຕົນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses 'ຝ່າຍ' instead of 'ຂ້າງ' for 'side'. While 'ຂ້າງ' isn't inherently wrong, 'ຝ່າຍ' is more commonly used in technical documentation in Lao for 'side' or 'department'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider changing 'ຂ້າງ' to 'ຝ່າຍ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Vietrādis URL" is not accurate. 'Vietrādis' is a rare and archaic term. A more understandable term would be 'Identitātes pakalpojuma URL' or 'Identitātes sniedzēja URL'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Identitātes pakalpojuma URL, kas tiek izmantots vienotajai atteikšanai identitātes nodrošinātāja pusē

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'eenmalig uitloggen' is a literal translation of 'single logout' and while understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in Dutch. 'Single logout' is often used directly or rephrased for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'De URL voor uitloggen via de Identity provider' or 'De URL voor Single Logout via de Identity provider'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrasing 'aan de kant van' is slightly clunky. A more fluent option would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'aan de kant van' and restructure the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'O URL utilizado para o término de sessão único no lado do Fornecedor da Identidade' is a literal translation but not the most natural way to express this in Portuguese. 'Término de sessão único' is a bit formal. A more common phrasing would be 'desligamento único' or 'encerramento de sessão único'. 'Fornecedor da Identidade' is also a literal translation of 'Identity provider' and can be simplified to 'provedor de identidade'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O URL utilizado para o desligamento único no provedor de identidade.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ පස තනි නික්මීම සඳහා මෙම ඒ.ස.නි. භාවිතා කරයි' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'The URL used for the single logout on the Identity provider side.' The term 'පස' (pasa) means 'side' or 'aspect', which isn't appropriate here. It creates a convoluted and inaccurate sentence. The English phrasing clearly refers to a URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would focus on the URL itself. Consider something like 'අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රෝවයිඩර‍් අතින් සිංහල විවේකය සඳහා භාවිතා කරන URL මෙයයි' (This is the URL used for single logout from the Identity Provider).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'සිංහල' might be confusing as it literally means 'Sinhala'. It's likely meant to indicate the 'single logout' functionality. While technically correct, it's unnecessarily specific and potentially misleading.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'සිංහල' with a more general term for 'single logout' if one exists in common Sinhala usage. Otherwise, a more descriptive phrase explaining what 'single logout' means might be necessary. Alternatively, consider using a transliteration if no good equivalent exists.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation feels slightly clunky and could benefit from a more natural flow in Sinhala. The sentence structure can be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Re-evaluate the sentence structure for a more natural and readable flow in Sinhala. Consider breaking it down into two shorter sentences for clarity. For example: 'මෙම URL අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ තනි නික්මීම් සඳහා භාවිතා වේ.' 'එය අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රෝවයිඩර් අතින් සිදුකරයි' (This URL is used for single logouts. It is performed by the Identity Provider).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'identitete' should be 'identitete'. While understandable, it's a slight misspelling.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: identitete

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL који се користи за једнострано одјављивање на страни Идентитетског пружаоца' is overly literal and not idiomatic Serbian. 'Strani' means 'foreign' or 'side' in a geographical sense, and doesn't fit the context of an identity provider.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL који се користи за једнострано одјављивање код провајдера идентитета

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a relatively formal tone. While acceptable, consider a slightly more accessible phrasing depending on the target audience. 'Пружаоца' is slightly clunky and formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more conversational phrasing like 'код провајдера' or 'на сајту провајдера' if a less formal tone is desired.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'постачальника посвідчень' is a slightly awkward phrasing. While technically correct, it's a bit verbose and formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адреса, яка використовується для єдиного виходу на стороні ідентифікатора
